statements: SELECT id, kpi_name, kpi_description FROM KPIs;
SELECT * FROM KPIs WHERE id = 1;
SELECT kpi_name, calculation_query FROM KPIs ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM KPIs WHERE kpi_name LIKE 'Sales%';
SELECT id, visualization_type FROM KPIs ORDER BY visualization_type ASC;
SELECT kpi_name, visualization_type FROM KPIs WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM KPIs WHERE kpi_name LIKE 'Sales%' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT kpi_name, calculation_query FROM KPIs WHERE visualization_type = 'Line Chart' AND id < 5;
SELECT DISTINCT visualization_type FROM KPIs WHERE id IN (2, 4, 6);
SELECT id, kpi_description FROM KPIs WHERE kpi_name = 'Profit Margin' OR visualization_type = 'Bar Chart';
SELECT * FROM KPIs;
SELECT kpi_name, kpi_value FROM KPIs WHERE kpi_value > 100;
SELECT kpi_name, kpi_description FROM KPIs ORDER BY kpi_name DESC;
SELECT kpi_name, data_value, data_date FROM KPIs JOIN KPI_Data ON KPIs.id = KPI_Data.kpi_id;
SELECT data_id, data_value, data_date FROM KPI_Data WHERE data_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT kpi_name, kpi_value FROM KPIs;
SELECT kpi_name, kpi_description, kpi_value FROM KPIs WHERE kpi_value > 1000;
SELECT kpi_name, data_value, data_date FROM KPIs JOIN KPI_Data ON KPIs.id = KPI_Data.kpi_id;
SELECT kpi_name, data_value, data_date FROM KPIs JOIN KPI_Data ON KPIs.id = KPI_Data.kpi_id ORDER BY data_date DESC;
SELECT kpi_name, kpi_value, data_date FROM KPIs JOIN KPI_Data ON KPIs.id = KPI_Data.kpi_id WHERE data_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT * FROM KPIs ORDER BY kpi_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT kpi_name, kpi_value FROM KPIs WHERE kpi_value > 100 ORDER BY kpi_name ASC;
SELECT calculation_formula FROM Calculations WHERE calc_name = 'Revenue';
SELECT * FROM Visualizations WHERE visualization_type = 'Pie Chart';
SELECT id, visualization_name FROM Visualizations ORDER BY id;
SELECT * FROM KPIs WHERE id = 1;
SELECT kpi_name, kpi_value FROM KPIs WHERE kpi_value > 100;
SELECT id, calc_name FROM Calculations ORDER BY calc_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Visualizations WHERE visualization_type = 'BarChart';
SELECT id, visualization_name FROM Visualizations WHERE id IN (1, 3);
SELECT * FROM kpi_data;
SELECT id, revenue FROM kpi_data ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT kpi_name, kpi_type FROM kpi_mapping WHERE kpi_type = 'Financial';
SELECT kpi_id, value FROM kpi_values WHERE value > 1000 ORDER BY value ASC;
SELECT visualization_id, chart_type FROM kpi_visualization WHERE kpi_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM kpi_data WHERE revenue > 1000 ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT k.kpi_name, v.value FROM kpi_mapping k JOIN kpi_values v ON k.kpi_id = v.kpi_id WHERE v.value > 5000
SELECT vd.visualization_id, vd.chart_type, kv.value FROM kpi_visualization vd JOIN kpi_values kv ON vd.kpi_id = kv.kpi_id WHERE kv.value < 3000 ORDER BY vd.visualization_id ASC
SELECT * FROM kpi_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
SELECT kpi_name, SUM(value) AS total_value FROM kpi_mapping km JOIN kpi_values kv ON km.kpi_id = kv.kpi_id GROUP BY kpi_name HAVING total_value > 20000
SELECT * FROM kpi_metrics;
SELECT name, value FROM kpi_metrics ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM kpi_data WHERE date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT k.category_name, d.date, d.value FROM kpi_categories k, kpi_data d WHERE k.category_id = d.kpi_id;
SELECT u.username, u.role, v.visualization_type FROM kpi_users u JOIN kpi_visualizations v ON u.user_id = v.kpi_id;
SELECT * FROM kpi_metrics WHERE value > 100 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, value FROM kpi_metrics WHERE id = 5;
SELECT kpi_id, date, value FROM kpi_data WHERE kpi_id = 3 AND date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT category_name, COUNT(*) AS total FROM kpi_categories GROUP BY category_name HAVING total > 5 ORDER BY total DESC;
SELECT username, role, visualization_type FROM kpi_users JOIN kpi_visualizations ON kpi_users.user_id = kpi_visualizations.kpi_id WHERE role = 'Admin';
